mapper.insert: insert into mj_user_detail (id, user_id, real_name, age, register_time, last_login_time, last_login_ip) values ( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update mj_user_detail set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
